text: With which application do you meet a problem ?
title: Application

text: Can you tell me the Subject of the issue ?
title: Subject of the issue

text: What is the impact for our business ?
title: Impact for Business

text: What BU are concerned about your problem ?
title: BU

text: Can you give me a reference Id (Bong/PIM/TURBO/BONG...) ?
title: Reference id

text: How often do you reproduce this issue? Is it an isolated case ?
title: How often do you reproduce this issue? Is it an isolated case ?

text: Description of the issue (precise dates/offers or links)
title: Description of the issue

text: How can we reproduce this issue? (Please explain all necessary steps to reproduce):
title: How could we reproduce this issue? (Please explain all necessary steps to reproduce)

text: Have you asked your teammates first ? (If they already had the issue and how could-you resolve it?)
title: Have you asked your teammates first ?

text: Which setup checks have been done or actions (indexation, check with APA in charge...) ?
title: Which setup checks have been done or actions ?
